sentence.Network_en: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.

sentence.Network_en: It is never a good idea to take sleeping tablets regularly.
sentence.Network_cn: 频繁服用安眠药绝对不是好办法。

sentence.Network_en: I take wheat and yeast tablets daily to purify the blood.
sentence.Network_cn: 我每天服用干酵母片以净化血液。

entry.def: A tablet is a small solid round mass of medicine which you swallow.

example.ex: It's time for your tablets, dear...
It is never a good idea to take sleeping tablets regularly.
example.tran: 频繁服用安眠药绝对不是好办法。

entry.def: Clay tablets or stone tablets are the flat pieces of clay or stone which people used to write on before paper was invented.

example.ex: He also studied the ancient stone tablets from around the pyramids.
example.tran: 他还研究了在金字塔周围发现的古代石匾。
